data: I'm currently reading [A Mind For Numbers by  Barbara Oakley](https://barbaraoakley.com/books/a-mind-for-numbers/) and [The Alloy of Law by Brandon Sanderson](https://www.google.ca/books/edition/The_Alloy_of_Law/TjiYUm-47bQC?hl=en&gbpv=0)

Here's a non-exhaustive list of books I've read in 2022. It's a mixture of Non-Fiction genres and of course Science Fiction, Fantasy, and Horror. I'm not sure what to do with this list just yet. Perhaps I'll write some reviews and recommendations but for now, here's a mostly useless bulleted list of books.
